author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Peacemaker Season 2 is now firmly in their own "multiverse of madness" as the characters may have found themselves in the DCU version of Earth-X, the alternate universe where the Nazis won World War 2. But we may have found a clue that suggests this isn't Earth-X, and could be another universe where the Allies lose the last world war. That clue lies in a throwaway Pokémon reference, but it could be something more. What do you think? Have Peacemaker and the gang travelled to Earth-X? Do you think they'll meet Uncle Sam and the Freedom Fighters? Let us know in the comments
title: Is Pokemon the Key to Peacemaker's Earth-X Mystery? - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer for Liminal Point, a classic action survival psychological horror game developed by HideWorks. Players will experience a sinister narrative of Lyra as she returns to Ashen Point. Face down the eyes of deadly enemies, explore what remains of the cryptic island, and seek the true nature of the night that enabled nothing to be the same as it once was. Liminal Point is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, GoG, and Epic Games Store).
title: Liminal Point - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for R.L. Stine's Pumpkinhead, a young-adult horror movie inspired by R.L. Stine’s “The Haunting Hour”, distributed by Tubi. Don't miss the adventures of a one-of-a-kind mystery in R.L. Stine's Pumpkinhead, streaming October 17 on Tubi.

A teenager, Sam thought moving to Redhaven was the worst part—until his brother Finn vanishes and no one, not even their mom, remembers he existed. With Halloween ticking down, Sam, his friend Becka, and Rusty, the town’s most eccentric outcast, must stop a harvest curse before Finn is lost forever.

R.L. Stine's Pumpkinhead stars Bean Reid, Adeline Lo, Kevin McNulty, Bob Frazer, Matty Finochio, Seth Isaac Johnson, and more. The film is written and directed by Jem Garrard and executive produced by James Mattagne, Joan Waricha, Harvey Kahn, Yvonne Bernard, Dan Bernard, Jem Garrard, Allen Lewis, and Rama Diallo. 

R.L. Stine's Pumpkinhead, streaming October 17 on Tubi.
title: R.L. Stine's Pumpkinhead - Official Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Soshiro Hoshina Character Trailer for Kaiju No. 8 The Game, a free-to-play turn-based RPG developed by Akatsuki Games. Players can get a look at Soshiro Hoshina in action, fitted with a kit consisting of an Ultimate State passive skill, Fleeting Slasher combat skill, and more, making him a formidable addition to any fight. Play as Soshiro Hoshina in Kaiju No. 8 now for iOS, Android, and PC (Steam).
title: Kaiju No. 8 The Game - Official Soshiro Hoshina Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Demo Launch Teaser Trailer for Mexican Ninja, a 2.5D arcade action roguelike developed by Madbricks. Players will assume the role of a Mexican Ninja to take the fight to the streets of Nuevo Tokyo. Engage in fast-paced combat and master powerful abilities to progress. Mexican Ninja is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mexican Ninja - Official Demo Launch Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this Hollow Knight Silksong video, we're taking you through how to get all 30 Fleas to get the Fleafriend Achievement. We also explain how to move the Flea Caravan to each new spot, and the requirements you need to meet for each step along the way. Please use the timestamps below to guide yourself around. 

00:00 - Intro
00:13 - Flea #1 (The Marrow)
01:45 - Flea #2 (Deep Docks)
02:30 - Flea #3 (Deep Docks)
04:11 - Flea #4 (Hunter's March)
05:27 - Flea #5 (Far Fields) 
06:35 - You can now move the Flea Caravan for the first time after finding five Fleas, move with them to Greymoor (if you want) and snag your Flea Brew tool
08:09 - Flea #6 (Greymoor)
09:56 - Flea #7 (Shellwood)
10:53 - Flea #8 (Bellhart) - from Shellwood
11:48 - Flea #9 (Greymoor) - Finding Kratt
12:55 - Flea #10 (Greymoor)
14:16 - Flea #11 (Blasted Steps)
15:00 - Flea #12 (Choral Chambers)
15:48 - Flea #13 (Underworks)
16:50 - Flea #14 (Whispering Vaults)
18:05 - Flea #15 (Mount Fay) - Once you get the Clawline abil
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - All Flea Locations | Fleafriend Achievement Guide

description:
Check out six minutes of new gameplay from Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive, the upcoming fast-action anime-styled co-op action-RPG that's due out for PC on November 17. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2373990/Solo_Leveling_ARISE_OVERDRIVE/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive – 6 Minutes of Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Check out this wild live-action trailer for Digimon Story: Time Stranger, the upcoming monster-taming RPG set in the popular anime universe. 
Play the demo now and/or wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1984270/Digimon_Story_Time_Stranger/
title: Digimon Story: Time Stranger – Official Live-Action Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the Gameplay Trailer for TIC-TAC Twelve O'Clock, an atmospheric survival horror game developed by Armag. Players will man the surveillance camers to monitor rooms and hallways to take on evil entities. Keep lights enabled, fuses replaced, and more in TIC-TAC Twelve O'Clock, coming soon to PC (Steam).

#TicTacTwelveOClock #Gaming #IGN
title: TIC-TAC Twelve O'Clock - Official Gameplay Trailer | Horror Game Awards Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Dragon Ball Z DLC Teaser Trailer for Minecraft, the hit adventure creation game developed by Mojang. Players can soon harness the power of Dragon Ball Z in an upcoming DLC with plenty of Dragon Ball Z skins to attain. The Dragon Ball Z DLC for Minecraft is launching in late 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Minecraft x Dragon Ball Z - Official DLC Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Season 1 Early Access Trailer for Skate, the new addition to the skateboarding arcade simulation game developed by Full Circle. 

Players will be able to get their hands on new content with the Skate.Pass, allowing for weekly Challenges to be completed to attain over 200 new items from clothes, skateboards, and more. Seasonal Events are also included, allowing for more rewards alongside new music, more branded gear, and more. Season 1 for Skate Early Access kicks off on October 7 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (EA App, Epic Games Store, and Steam).

#IGN #Skate #Skateboarding
title: Skate - Official Season 1 Early Access Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Steam Next Fest Demo Launch Trailer for Terrifier: The ARTcade Game, a retro-inspired arcade beat 'em up game developed by Relevo. 

Players will head into the action alone or with friends in co-op mode to deliver intense attacks to enemies across a suite of different levels. Make use of weaponry from chainsaws to cleavers, with multiple paths to explore and challenges to overcome. Terrifier: The ARTcade Game is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam), with a demo available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam) as part of Steam Next Fest.

#IGN #Terrifer #Retro
title: Terrifier: The ARTcade Game - Official Steam Next Fest Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Episode of Heartslabyul' Trailer (English Sub) for Disney Twisted-Wonderland: The Animation, an anime series based on the hit mobile game distributed by Disney. Follow the story of Yuken Enma, a student who gets enrolled in a magic academy with students based on legendary Disney villains, searching for a way home. Disney Twisted-Wonderland: The Animation Episode of Heartslabyul streams on October 29 on Hulu and Disney+.

Lost in a dark fairy tale realm, Yu enrolls at a magical academy where ghosts roam freely and students battle for supremacy in an upcoming supernatural competition.

Disney Twisted-Wonderland: The Animation stars Natsuki Hanae, Seiichiro Yamashita, Chiaki Kobayashi, Ryôta Suzuki, and more. 

Disney Twisted-Wonderland: The Animation Episode of Heartslabyul streams on October 29 on Hulu and Disney+.

#IGN #TwistedWonderland #Disney
title: Disney Twisted-Wonderland: The Animation - Official 'Episode of Heartslabyul' Trailer (English Sub)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Pre-Alpha Extended Expedition Gameplay Trailer for Hunger, a first-person PvPvE extraction shooter developed by Good Fun Corporation. 

Players will fight their way through the savage lands of Napoleonic Europe after a plague overtakes the region, turning innocence into untamed monsters against humanity. Scavenge for supplies, engage with deep RPG progression systems, and extract to live another day alone or with friends in co-op. Hunger is launching into Early Access in 2026 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Hunger #PvPvE
title: Hunger - Official Pre-Alpha Extended Expedition Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the 'Control the Chaos' Feature Trailer for Jurassic World Evolution 3, an upcoming dinosaur park management simulation game developed by Frontier Developments. 

Players can get the overview of the team players will have to ensure maintenance, safety, medical needs, and more to make sure the park's and dinosaurs' needs are met while the player works on the bigger duties of the park. Jurassic World Evolution 3 is launching on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #JurassicWorldEvolution3 #JurassicWorld
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official 'Control the Chaos' Feature Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Watanabe Mode Gameplay Trailer for Ghost of Yotei, the hit action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions. 

Players can access a new Watanabe Mode in the game that changes the music to a lo-fi-esque style inspired by acclaimed anime director Shinichirō Watanabe, with original music under the direction of Watanabe. Explore the surrounding lands of Mount Yotei with a new vibe in Ghost of Yotei, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #GhostOfYotei  #ShinichiroWatanabe
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official Watanabe Mode Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We compare Mario Kart World and Sonic Racing CrossWorlds after the latest updates. Mario Kart’s Knockout Tour has matchmaking issues, while Sonic’s CrossWorlds is shaping up to be a strong contender on Switch, with a Switch 2 version coming soon. Which racer comes out on top?

#MarioKartWorld #SonicRacingCrossWorlds #IGN
title: Mario Kart World VS Sonic Racing CrossWorlds - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! The gaming world is reeling from yet another Microsoft price hike, this one hitting Game Pass and raising the price from $19.99 to $29.99 a month for the Ultimate plan. It's a signifiant jump of 50% — the largest single increase in the service's history. While the Ultimate plan still gives subscribers access to hundreds of games and some major first-party titles on Day 1, at what point is it not really worth it? Even if you love the service and all it provides, how many games a month are you actually playing? Plus we have last week's poll results and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

#IGN #Gaming
title: At What Point Is Game Pass Not a Good Deal Anymore? - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Meet the real people behind the real story of Roofman, only in theaters October 10.
Based on an unbelievable true story, Roofman follows Jeffrey Manchester (Channing Tatum), an Army veteran and struggling father who turns to robbing McDonald’s restaurants by cutting holes in their roofs, earning him the nickname: Roofman. After escaping prison, he secretly lives inside a Toys “R” Us for six months, surviving undetected while planning his next move. But when he falls for Leigh (Kirsten Dunst), a divorced mom drawn to his undeniable charm, his double life begins to unravel, setting off a compelling and suspenseful game of cat and mouse as his past closes in.
title: Roofman - Official The Real People Behind the Scenes Clip (2025) Channing Tatum, Peter Dinklage

author: IGN
description:
There are several Reliquary puzzles hidden throughout Ghost of Yotei, each tied to a poem and a unique charm reward. The first one most players will encounter is the Reliquary of Courage in the Yotei Grasslands. In this guide, we’ll walk you through how to find the reliquary, solve its wolf statue puzzle, and unlock the Charm of Mount Yotei.

#IGN #Gaming #GhostOfYotei
title: Ghost of Yotei: Reliquary of Courage Guide | How to Get the Charm of Mount Yotei
